0: Welcome to your first day of training, Heist Meister. Please move to the next objective marker. Use the [W] [A] [S] [D] keys to move.
1: Excellent.  Next, we'll practice interacting with objects.Open the door ahead of you by clicking on it with the mouse.  Remember that you'll need to be close enough to touch it.
2: We've turned out the lights because you'll be working in the dark a lot.  We've given you a T.O.U.C.A.N. night vision set. Cycle through your vision modes by pressing [SPACE].  Head to the next objective in T.O.U.C.A.N. mode.
3: The loot is ahead in that folder.  Pick it up by walking over it.
4: You must open that locked door. Go to comuter and check password by clicking on it
